name: Red Feather Fan (In Effect)
description: The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die.
descriptionraw: The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a $[K2] instead of a $[K1]. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die.
descriptionreplaced: The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color> instead of a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>. It will also cost 1 less Elemental Die.
